backend/main.mo: Main actor defining door entry types (CoatingType, DoorEntry) and CRUD operations (addDoor, getAll, getTotals, deleteDoor, getEntry) with square feet calculation and coating type totals aggregation.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that copies door entries and nextId from old actor state to new actor state during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four features that remove grouping logic from DoorEntryList, GrandTotals, pdfGenerator, and whatsappShare to display all entries individually.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering components, hooks, utilities for door entry management, quotation generation, and UI theming.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, and other design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tags and root div for React app mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating customer info form, door entry form/list, grand totals, quotation actions, theme toggle, and footer with state management for customer data and refresh triggers.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: Form component with icon-enhanced inputs for customer name and mobile number used in quotation generation.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: Form for adding door entries with fraction/decimal dimension parsing; automatically creates entries for all 4 coating types (single, double, doubleSagwan, laminate) using rounded dimensions.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryList.ts: Displays a table of door entries with dimensions, square footage, and calculated coating costs (single, double, double+sagwan, laminate). Supports deletion of individual entries and shows totals in the footer.
frontend/src/components/GrandTotals.tsx: Shows a summary card with total square footage and calculated costs for all four coating types across all door entries. Displays loading and error states with retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/QuotationActions: Provides buttons to generate a printable HTML quotation or share it via WhatsApp. Clears all entries and customer info after successful generation or sharing.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook, displaying sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking. Creates and manages AuthClient with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching door entries, totals, and mutations for adding/deleting individual or all door entries. Automatically invalidates related queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and system preference detection. Applies theme by toggling the 'dark' class on the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a wood-inspired color palette supporting light and dark modes, plus utility classes for touch-friendly targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/coatingRates.ts: Defines coating rate constants (single, double, double sagwan, laminate) and provides functions to get rates by coating type and calculate amounts for all coating types given square footage.
frontend/src/utils/dimensionRounding.ts: Provides functions to round door height and width to standard carpenter sizes using custom threshold rules (e.g., >78 and ≤80 → 80, >80 and ≤84 → 84).
frontend/src/utils/fractionParser.ts: Parses dimension inputs supporting decimal and fraction formats (e.g., '78 2/8'), validates Indian fractions (eighths), and converts decimals back to fraction display format.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates HTML quotation documents listing all door entries individually with dimensions, square feet, and amounts for all four coating types, plus totals summary.
Calculates square feet from rounded door dimensions using the formula (height × width) / 144.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Shares quotation via WhatsApp using Web Share API or fallback URL, formatting all door entries individually with dimensions and amounts for all coating types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking known issues with door entries being merged by size instead of stored as unique array items, with pending feature requests to fix backend/frontend storage using unique IDs.
